charges.charge_description: Willfully inflict corporal injury upon a spouse, in violation of California  Penal Code§ 273.5 (a), assimilated by Title 18 United States Code§ 13; Be present in a park area when under the influence of alcohol to a degree that may endanger oneself or another person, or damage property or park resources in violation of Title 36 Code of Federal Regulations§ 2.35(c); Destroy, injure, deface, or damage property or real property, in violation of Title 36 Code of Federal Regulations§ 2.31(a)(3)

charges.charge_offence_description: Willfully inflict corporal injury upon a spouse, i
